A

actionAddNewContact(ActionEvent) - Method in class userinterface.ListOfContactsController
The method actionAddNewContact sets the selected contact to null, and switches to the contact view.
actionCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class userinterface.ContactController
The method actionCancel is used to switch back to the ListOfContactsView without doing any modification of the database.
actionDeleteContact(ActionEvent) - Method in class userinterface.ListOfContactsController
The method actionDeleteContact triggers a deletion of a selected contact, after the choice to delete the contact has been confirmed by clicking Yes in a popup window.
actionListAllContacts(ActionEvent) - Method in class userinterface.ListOfContactsController
The method actionListAllContacts lists all contacts in the database, by searching for an empty text string.
actionSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class userinterface.ContactController
The method actionSave is used to trigger the update of an existing contact in the database, or the addition of a new contact to the database.
actionSearch(ActionEvent) - Method in class userinterface.ListOfContactsController
The method actionSearch performs a search in the database, for the text string that has been written in the search field.
actionUpdateContact(ActionEvent) - Method in class userinterface.ListOfContactsController
The method actionUpdateContact sets the selected contact to the one chosen in the table, and switches to the contact view.
add(Contact) - Method in class contacthandling.ContactHandler
given a contact detail, add to contactList
add(Contact) - Method in class databasehandling.DbHandler
Adds Contact to database
addAContactAndDisplayTheContactList() - Method in class contacthandling.ContactHandlerTest
 
AddDb - Class in databasehandling
An abstract class that is used by the DbHandler instance when a new contact shall be added to the database.
AddDb() - Constructor for class databasehandling.AddDb
 
addListener(InvalidationListener) - Method in class contacthandling.ContactHandler
 
AddToTheContactListViaAddingToDatabaseAndReturnContactList() - Method in class contacthandling.ContactHandlerTest
